newsitem.title: USA: HOT STOCKS HIGHLIGHTS - Earnings move shares.
newsitem.headline: HOT STOCKS HIGHLIGHTS - Earnings move shares.

text.p: MICROSOFT CORP - Shares dropped after the company reported fourth quarter earnings that fell shy of Wall Street's most optimistic expectations. Microsoft posted fourth quarter earnings of $0.80 a share, up from $0.43 a share a year ago, which was one cent above First Call's consensus estimate. Shares fell 5-1/4 to 144-1/4.
SUN MICROSYSTEMS INC - posted fourth quarter earnings of $0.61 a share compared with $0.31 a share a year ago. Down 2-4/16 to 43-3/8.

SYNOPSYS INC - Reported third quarter earnings of $0.38 a share compared with $0.28 a share on a 22 percent increase in revenues. Goldman Sachs downgraded the stock to market perform from market outperform. Off 8-1/4 to 30.
MICRO LINEAR - posted second quarter earnings of $0.19 a share compared with $0.14 a share a year ago; revenues increased 43 percent to $19.5 million. Down 5-6/16 to 8-3/16.
XILINX INC - reported flat fourth quarter earnings of $0.41 a share, while revenues increased to $160 million from $150 million. Down 2-7/16 to 47-1/2.
IOMEGA CORP - second quarter earnings increased to $0.19 a share from $0.11 a share on 41 percent increase in revenues. Up 2-7/16 to 24-5/16.

SHIVA CORP - posted a second quarter loss of $0.03 a share compared with a gain of $0.16 a share a year ago. Revenues dropped 23 percent to $39.7 million. The company also said it expects the third quarter to be challenging due to seasonally slow summer in Europe.
LSI LOGIC CORP - posted second quarter earnings of $0.32 per diluted share, down from $0.34 a share a year ago. Revenues increased about two percent to $332.0 million. Down 2-3/4 to 32.
CFI PROSERVICES INC - Reported second quarter earnings of $0.28 a share compared with $0.22 a share a year ago. Hambrecht & Quist downgraded the stock to hold from buy. Down 2-3/4 to 15-1/4.
COHU INC - Second quarter earnings fell to $0.70 a share compared with $0.78 a share. Sales slipped three percent. Up 8-13/16 to 44-13/16.
